text: (he nabee!) yahoodiyon mein se kuchh log aise hain, jo shabdon ko unake (vaastavik) sthaanon se pherate hain aur (aapase) kahate hain ki hamane sun liya tatha (aapakee) avagya kee aur aap sunie, aap sunaaye na jaayen! tatha apanee zubaanen modakar "raina" kahate aur satdharm mein vyang karate hain aur yadi ve "hamane sun liya aur aagyaakaaree ho gaye" aur "hamen dekhie" kahate, to unake lie adhik achchhee tatha sahee baat hotee. parantu allaah ne unake kufr ke kaaran unhen dhikkaar diya hai. atah, unamen se thode hee eemaan laayenge
